question: Mekedatu dam project across the river Cauvery was recently in news. Consider the following statements about the river Cauvery. 1.It rises on Brahmagiri Hill of the Western Ghats. 2.Hemavati, Lakshmantirtha, Kabani , Amaravati, Noyil, and Bhavani rivers are its tributaries. 3.It flows in North-easterly direction. Which of these is/are true regarding the river?
explanation: Mekedatu dam project was being set up by the Karnataka government. Its primary objective is to supply drinking water to Bengaluru and recharge the groundwater table in the region. Cauvery River flows in a south-easterly direction. The Kaveri continues through a series of twisted wild gorges until it reaches Hogenakal Falls.
